summary:
Very well trained in corporate communications, media and public relations.

Romanian native speaker, with full professional proficiency in both English and French, as well as a working level of Spanish. 

At ease in a multicultural, international, exciting and challenging environment.

Keen to learn, adaptable, I am a drive for results kind of person.

education.field_of_study: Languages, International Business and European Management

awards.description: Main courses: European Institutions, Intercultural Communication, International Business in a Globalized World, Cross Cultural Marketing, International Marketing Strategy.
